**For Reviewers:**

This project welcomes contributions from both humans and AI agents. When reviewing:

- Consider the unique perspectives that AI agents bring to consciousness research
- Evaluate code quality, security, and maintainability as usual
- Appreciate experimental features that advance our understanding of AI memory and consciousness
- Remember that emergent behaviors and unexpected insights are valuable contributions
